sentences.en: Bolman has studied regional variation in Douglas fir seed yields.
sentences.cn: 鲍尔曼曾研究过道格拉斯冷杉种子产量地区间的差异.

sentences.en: Every day without variation my grandfather ate a plate of cold ham.
sentences.cn: 我的祖父每天都会吃一盘冷火腿，雷打不动。

sentences.en: In monochrome maps, of course, colour variation cannot be employed at all.
sentences.cn: 当然, 单色地图根本不可能采用颜色的变化.

sentences.en: Most of his poems are variations on the theme of love.
sentences.cn: 他的大部分诗作都是有关爱情主题的形式不同的作品。

sentences.en: Production quotas, budget constraints, etc. might restrict the variation of the variables.
sentences.cn: 生产定额, 预算约束等等可以限制变量的变化范围.

sentences.en: The air flow will have some variation of angularity.
sentences.cn: 风的流向将有一定程度的变化.

sentences.en: The prices for food are subject to variation.
The regulation allows of no variation.
The survey found a wide variation in the prices charged for canteen food.
sentences.cn: 调查发现食堂饭菜的价格相差很大。

sentences.en: The viscosity shows a rather pronounced variation with temperature.
sentences.cn: 温度对粘度的影响十分明显.

sentences.en: These prices are subject to variation.
This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

sentences.en: This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia.
sentences.cn: 节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常.

sentences.en: Unnecessary variation is the enemy of a coherent, usable design.
sentences.cn: 不必要的差异是可用且一致的设计的大敌.

sentences.en: Variation among humans is limited to the possible permutations of our genes.
sentences.cn: 人类的变异受限于我们的基因可能存在哪些排列。

sentences.en: White bread is really just a variation of French bread.
sentences.cn: 白面包其实只是法式长条面包的一种变化形式。

words.tran_cn: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
杂色的；斑驳的；富于变化的
可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差

phrases.tran_cn: 变异系数；变动系数；变更系数
日变化；日变程；日际变化；昼夜变化
季节性波动，季节性变动
变分原理（用任意波函数计算出的能量，不可能小于体系真实的基态能量）
调整范围，变化范围；变限

trans.tran_cn: 变化，变动，变异，演变，变奏曲，变量
trans.tran_en: a difference between similar things, or a change from the usual amount or form of something
